location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘APPENDIX D. DISTILLATION PLANT AND POWER HOUSE (DIAGRAMMATIC)’

mods.abstract: Diagram sketching of distillation plant and power house at Ras El Hadd (Ras Al Hadd) landing ground at Salalah, Oman.The diagram is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942’. The diagram itself is marked as Appendix D.
